attributes.action: Start an investigation into Priti Patel’s conduct in Israel Immediately!
attributes.additional_details:
Priti Patel had 12 meetings with various Israeli officials without the government’s knowledge.

Yet her meetings resulted in her seeking aid for the Israeli army from taxpayer’s money. 

To claim that her meetings had no serious implications would be misleading the public. 

Start an investigation immediately into whether she broke ethical or ministerial codes.
attributes.background:
Priti Patel misled the public with her statement claiming to have only had 2 meetings. She then went onto claim that the meetings were not related to her work as a minister. These claims were later found to be false. 

The taxpayers deserve to know with full transparency the nature of her visit.

rejection.details: Priti Patel is no longer a member of the Government.
